Articles.Content:
So with .25 just out. I immidatly checked if Kw Rockety was updated and it wasn't. Then I noticed it had a cool feature, that I didn't know it had. Now i'm desperatly hoping they update it. After searching the web, I saw that Kw Rocketry was basically dying. So I just was wondering if its going to be updated or do I have to downgrade(If possible, just joined in .24) to .24.2. So will Kw Rocketry be updated?

Edited October 9, 2014 by Rainstorm
kw is a parts pack, so it may or may not be broken by the update. try it to see if it works
I did, it seemed to work a bit, but the 1.25 fairings wouldn't close all the way and the engines arn't flush with the part their being attached to. They are like a foot below it.

I would suggest looking at (the last page of) the KW Rocketry thread. It's usually good practice to look at the thread of the addon itself.

Please take the discussion there.
